message: Starting critique: gathering phase handover and task context to understand what was delivered

Completing architectural analysis - formulating critique observations on SQLite migration and review flow

Critique submitted successfully. Key findings: (1) SQLite migration eliminates race conditions - architecturally sound, (2) Hybrid SQLite+JSON approach introduces complexity, (3) orchestrator/review.py appears orphaned (2276 lines), (4) No schema versioning visible - future risk, (5) Global registry still JSON per CLAUDE.md. Recommended: complete SQLite migration for global registry, add schema versioning, clarify review.py fate. Review enforcement is bulletproof - manual approval properly blocked. Submitted 8 observations with detailed file:line citations.
